entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
